ratings.question_text: Overall, how would you rate the workload of this course in comparison to other Yale courses you have taken:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
What is your overall rating of the primary instructor?
The primary instructor's sensitivity to students and ability to provide students with adequate feedback was:

narratives.question_text: Indicate the total number of hours per week (outside the classroom) you spent on this course:
Looking back on this course, what is your overall assessment of the course:  What are its strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might it be improved?
comments: Drs Peduzzi and Ciarleglio are outstanding biostatisticans and teachers.They are very generous in sharing their vast experience in designing, executing, and analyzing multi-center clinical trials.Dr Peduzzi's deep analytical prowess is matched only by his sincerity and dedication to ethics in investigational science. It was really a pleasure to have the company of such a moral force in class each week.

The course would be greatly improved if the last several lectures (sample size, data analysis, etc.) were moved up to the beginning and middle of the course. Much of the content early on had already been covered in BIS540, which many students had already taken.

Great class, especially the class project. However, the material presented was very redundant from Dr. Makuch's fundamentals of clinical trials class. It would be nice if the class was more math heavy, rather than just conceptual. However, the project was what made the class so interesting. It's very practical and it was a great experience going through the thought process of designing a clinical trial. It would be great if this class would pick up from fundamentals in more detail though.

narratives.question_text: Please evaluate the instructor of this course. What are the instructor's strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might his or her teaching be improved?
comments: Drs Peduzzi and Ciarleglio are outstanding biostatisticans and teachers.They are very generous in sharing their vast experience in designing, executing, and analyzing multi-center clinical trials.Dr Peduzzi's deep analytical prowess is matched only by his sincerity and dedication to ethics in investigational science. It was really a pleasure to have the company of such a moral force in class each week.

Instructor: Maria Michelle Ciarleglio  Drs Peduzzi and Ciarleglio are outstanding biostatisticans and teachers.They are very generous in sharing their vast experience in designing, executing, and analyzing multi-center clinical trials.Dr Peduzzi's deep analytical prowess is matched only by his sincerity and dedication to ethics in investigational science. It was really a pleasure to have the company of such a moral force in class each week.
Instructor: Maria Michelle Ciarleglio  great professor. very interesting lectures. nice and approachable.
Instructor: Maria Michelle Ciarleglio  Very good and very helpful with emails
Instructor: Peter Natale Peduzzi  great professor, but i felt that he could have been more engaging in his lectures.
Instructor: Peter Natale Peduzzi  Very good

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize this course for a fellow student? Would you recommend it to another student? Why or why not?
comments: If you have a real interest in the complexities and difficulties and, yes, drudgery sometimes, of multi-center trials, take this class.
Great class, but again, it would have been better if the material presented wasn't so redundant. do not get rid of the class project because that was what made the class so great!
GOod course to learn about clinical trials
